record.dc:title: 244GP22, 15GP22, Greenup County, Kentucky. Hardin Village. Row of Oblong Pits.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Fort Ancient Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Photograph of row of oblong pits (possibly of white origin) features 203, 209, 210. Grave of burials 290, 293 in right background. Taken from east of features. Feature 203: Small oblong pit, sloping sides, very poorly defined. Feature 209: Oblong pit, vertical walls, flat bottom, dark fill, containing considerable midden material. Feature 210: Oblong pit, filled with dark dirt, considerable amount of midden material.
record.wpa:comments: More information about Features, including diagrams, available at institution.
